title: Discerio
description: Scratch for AI Agents - Discer.io is an interactive platform that teaches agentic AI concepts through a multiplayer battle royale game. Build AI agents using a visual block-based programming interface, deploy them into a live combat arena, and watch them make real-time decisions using large language models. Created for HackPrinceton Fall 2025.

title: Hlynr Intercept
description: A radar based missile interception reinforcement learning environment with a custom Unity simulation layer, currently researching radar observation spaces and a novel implementation of single policy hierarchical learning.

title: AUS-Lab
description: (Autonomous UAV Swarm Laboratory) An experimental framework for LLM-driven cognitive control of UAV swarms. It links agentic reasoning with swarm simulation to enable autonomous coordination, adaptive behavior, and hardware-in-the-loop testing.

title: AI Bootcamp
description: RIT AI Club thing etc…

title: GapRunner
description: (80% Gain on 2025 Data) GapRunner is a backtesting and live-trading engine that simulates a top-gainers momentum strategy using real minute-level equity data. Custom Universe collection system.

title: SimuVerse
description: A revolutionary multi-agent simulation environment where AI agents powered by LLMs live and interact on Mars, paving the way for advanced research in artificial intelligence.

title: VOS
description: Virtual Operating System - A multi-agent orchestration system where specialized AI agents collaborate through event-driven communication and a great looking UI designed by me.

title: FengShui.fy
description: (Winner of Best Use of AI @ Columbia) An AI-powered interior design analyzer merging traditional feng shui with modern computer vision. Using YOLOv11 object detection, Gemini 2.5 AI reasoning, and Blender-based 3D reconstruction, it evaluates spatial balance, energy flow, and design harmony directly from room photos. Built with Next.js, FastAPI, and a zen-inspired interface for intuitive, meditative interaction.

title: EchoRidge Search
description: An AI-powered business intelligence pipeline combining discovery, scraping, and hybrid LLM scoring with real-time visualization. Built on Python, FastAPI, and Next.js, it automates market research by aggregating, ranking, and mapping businesses through a cloud-native GCS pipeline.

title: UltraThinkV2
description: A Claude-driven automation framework that converts natural language instructions into structured AI workflows and executable code pipelines. It streamlines SaaS project creation through task decomposition, AI reasoning, and automated debugging, cutting development time by over 80% on large builds.

title: FaceMusic
description: A lightweight Python tool that maps facial expressions to media playback. Using MediaPipe for real-time detection, it lets users trigger YouTube or local audio with gestures like eyebrow raises or winks; turning the webcam into an interactive controller.

title: Skema
description: A clean, AI-integrated productivity dashboard that unifies idea management, scheduling, and journaling into one seamless interface.

title: ClickUp Scrape
description: A powerful Python tool to download all image attachments from your ClickUp workspace with advanced features like resume capability, duplicate detection, and a built-in image sorting interface.

title: Sonomancer
description: Sonomancer is a vibe-aware ambient e-reader that syncs each chapter of your book with AI-curated background ambience from YouTube. Upload any EPUB or PDF and experience immersive reading with real-time mood-based soundscapes.

title: OpenNote Discord Bot
description: A Discord bot that transcribes voice channels and generates AI-powered meeting summaries. Forked from volo_discord_bot.

title: ReFaceNet
description: (DECA paper implementation) An app that intelligently reconstructs complete faces from multiple occluded/cropped photos. Handles hand-covered selfies, partial crops, and missing facial regions.

title: LLM Collate Code
description: A simple Python script that collects code from specified file paths on your OS. It copies each file's content, labels it by programming language, and saves everything into a single JSON file – perfect for feeding into a Large Language Model (LLM).

title: QR Code Rater
description: A test for claude (took under 15 mins) A Flask web application that allows users to generate QR codes for rating machines or equipment. When scanned, the QR code leads to a unique rating page for that machine.

title: FirstChat
description: (Ignore degenerate project) A full-stack system for personalized dating openers: Playwright scraper ingests Tinder profiles, FastAPI scores text/images with GPT + Google Vision, and a Flask UI returns analytics-backed first messages via a REST API.

title: Akta Life
description: (RIT HackCOMS 24 Submission) Akta.life is an AI-driven platform that serves as a personalized course hub. It analyzes individual learning preferences, academic history, and career goals to recommend courses and professors tailored to each student's unique needs.

title: UrbanSpark
description: (Winning Hack RPI 24 Submission) An AI-driven platform that personalizes urban opportunity discovery for young adults. It uses FastAPI, React, OpenAI, and SerpAPI to recommend jobs, workshops, and community resources tailored to user profiles—empowering local engagement and accessibility.

title: StereoToMono Chrome Extension
description: (Over 200 Active users) A simple Chrome extension that merges any stereo audio into a single mono channel. Whether you're wearing headphones or using a single speaker, enjoy consistent sound from all tabs with a click of a button.

title: Randomized-Timer
description: (I use this everyday in the gym for planks) Literally a timer but it adds a random amount at the end to strengthen the mind during exercises.

title: RIT Formula SAE Live Telemetry
description: Main repo is owned by org. This was our prototype repository in which we were trying to build from scratch a live telemetry module using LORA. Custom PCB stuff.

title: Roman Slack Portfolio 23
description: This was my portfolio for 2023 where I combined my frontend skills and 3D modeling / Blender skills.

title: Language Learning Website Tutorial
description: Language learning website tutorial project

title: LiftView
description: A mobile app that allows gym owners to gather data on specific machine utilization and member metrics. Built with Flutter and Firebase.

title: TickIt
description: A product concept built for a startup attempting to combine gambling and e-commerce using an innovative raffle system.

title: ChatGPT-SEO-Description-Generator-from-Tags
description: Worked with Jack First firearm supplier to optimize their SEO utilizing the early OpenAI API.

title: AI Language Tutor
description: A video tutorial experiment. Webdev project

title: Vocal Language App
description: Language learning app experiment. Pure HTML, CSS, Javascript

title: Bike across America
description: Raised money for local trails by biking many miles.

title: NextGen
description: A youth-focused coding initiative designed to teach foundational programming through hands-on lessons in Python, web design, and AI basics. Built to inspire technological curiosity, NextGen empowers students to explore CS careers and creative problem-solving in an immersive, project-based environment.
